message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about the habitat of sponges. Sponges are typically found in aquatic environments. Option (B), a rotting ship, is the most likely place for sponges to make their home as it provides a damp and nutrient-rich environment that is suitable for their survival. Options (A), (C), and (D) are all incorrect because sponges do not typically inhabit these types of environments.
